alert.note: Alert for Churchill (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 03 at 9:23AM PDT until September 03 at 10:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Churchill County in west central Nevada... * Until 1000 AM PDT. * At 923 AM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Middlegate, north of US-50. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, fencing and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Churchill County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
